hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I've spent the last 3 years building and scaling software for some pretty cool companies. I also teach children to stem knowledge (science & programming ðŸ¤–). Let's connect!

aboutme.content1: Hey! I'm Alex,graduated from HKUST Computer Science. if you haven't already gathered that by now. I specialize in the frontend, primarily reactjs and java, but love building with whatever tools are right for the job.
aboutme.content2: I am also a foolish person who starve for new stuff - technology ,news ,3D modeling ,boxing , basketball and bad jokes .He love learning in depth for topics and seeking more creative projects.
